item.title: What Trump does next on Ukraine is key - and he could go either way
item.description: Neither Putin nor Zelensky want to be seen by Trump as the obstacle to peace, writes Frank Gardner.

item.title: Zelensky says Russia considering end to war a 'positive sign'
item.description: The Ukrainian president reiterates calls for a 30-day ceasefire after Vladimir Putin offered "direct talks".

item.title: India-Pakistan ceasefire appears to hold after accusations of violations
item.description: Delhi and Islamabad earlier accused each other of breaches, after four days of cross-border attacks.

item.title: Pope Leo prays at tomb of Francis ahead of first Sunday address
item.description: Pope Leo will be formally inaugurated at a mass next week.

item.title: What is habeas corpus and why might Donald Trump want to suspend it?
item.description: It is a safeguard against unlawful imprisonment - but the White House is "actively looking" at pausing it.
